name: AMD Radeon RX 9800 XTX
description: AMD flagship GPU with 24GB GDDR7 and RDNA 5 architecture. Features FSR 4.0 with ML frame generation, excellent ray tracing, and industry-leading power efficiency.

reviews.review_text: Finally competitive with NVIDIA at the high end. Great card.
FSR 4.0 is impressive. Almost matches DLSS now.
Amazing Linux support. Drivers just work.
